mean_en: a tendency to be away from work or school without a good reason :the practice or habit of being absent from work or school
sentence: Your absenteeism is the reason I\u0027m firing you.
sentence_trans: 旷工是我开除你的原因。
word_etyma: abs 变坏，离去 + ent关于...的 + ee表示人 + ism ...主义 → n. 旷工；旷课；有计划的怠工；经常无故缺席
